children.text: BUG: presumably, the tableau stacks could get long enough to run off the screen
BUG: undoing a card from the stock causes it to stay face down?
ART: tableaus, stock, etc. for each deck (maybe different foundations too)
for drag&drop, prefer tableau stacks that aren't the one you're dragging from
let the player know when there are "no valid moves remaining"
ART: buttons going down the side would be preferable for layouts with fanned tableaus
interstitial screen for variants of variants, e.g. 1 vs 3 card flip for klondike
menu button for rules?
cooler win condition
stats
some nice background around layout instead of letterboxing
auto-complete once cards are in order
hint button
Setting: deck choice
SFX: foundation is completed, e.g. https://games.aarp.org/games/forty-thieves-solitaire
art: something to go under the stock + discard and/or a border for the foundations (to distinguish discard from foundations)
clicking the northernmost card of a sorted same-suit stack will move the whole stack to the foundation
show how many cards are in stock, maybe also how many flips are
can probably remove isCardMovable boolean since it should always have the same value as drag&drop enabled?
try to move PushToUndoArray calls inside MoveToX functions
PROTOTYPE RELEASE LIST:
klondike 3-card
fix stock size
note in text that there aren't any settings yet
make sure debug stuff doesn't show up in build
